tool_description: Searches for bathroom fixtures across multiple suppliers and catalogs based on type, style, and basic specifications.

fixture_type.description: Type of fixture to search for: toilet, sink, bathtub, shower, faucet, vanity

style_preference.description: Preferred style: modern, traditional, transitional, contemporary, rustic

error_messages: Invalid fixture type: Use one of [toilet, sink, bathtub, shower, faucet, vanity]
Invalid price range: Ensure price_range_min is less than price_range_max and both are positive numbers
Invalid style preference: Use one of [modern, traditional, transitional, contemporary, rustic] or leave blank
usage: Specify the fixture_type you want to search for, optionally narrow results with style_preference, price_range_min/max, and brand_preference.

total_results.description: Total number of fixtures found matching criteria

product_ids.description: Array of unique product identifiers for found fixtures

product_names.description: Array of product names corresponding to product_ids

base_prices.description: Array of base prices corresponding to each product
